entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
